R

ReaLSurvivalAPI - com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api中的接口
Use RealSurvivalAPI api = (RealSurvivalAPI) Bukkit.getPluginManager().getPlugin("RealSurvival"); to get API
RealSurvivalEvent - com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event中的类
 
removeAllIllness(Player) - 接口 中的方法com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.ReaLSurvivalAPI
Remove a player鈥檚 all illnesses 移除某一玩家的所有病
removeIllness(Player, String) - 接口 中的方法com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.ReaLSurvivalAPI
Remove a player鈥檚 illness 移除某一玩家的一种病
RSMakeItemByFurnaceEvent - com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event中的类
When player start make a item by furnace 当玩家用RealSurvival中的Furnace制作物品时触发此事件
RSMakeItemByFurnaceEvent(Player, FurnaceRecipe, Location, String) - 类 的构造器com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event.RSMakeItemByFurnaceEvent
 
RSMakeItemByWorkbenchEvent - com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event中的类

RSMakeItemByWorkbenchEvent(Player, WorkbenchRecipe, Location, String) - 类 的构造器com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event.RSMakeItemByWorkbenchEvent
 
RSMakeItemDoneByFurnaceEvent - com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event中的类
start when player made over a item.
RSMakeItemDoneByFurnaceEvent(Player, FurnaceRecipe, Location, String, boolean) - 类 的构造器com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event.RSMakeItemDoneByFurnaceEvent
 
RSMakeItemDoneByWorkbenchEvent - com.outlook.schooluniformsama.api.event中的类
